original_text: ‘You also know the rule that God gave to your ancestors: “If you make a promise to God, you must do what you have said.”
korean_text: 또 옛 사람에게 말한 바 헛 맹세를 하지 말고 네 맹세한 것을 주께 지키라 하였다는 것을 너희가 들었으나

sentences.original_text: that God gave to your ancestors
If you make a promise to God
you must do what you have said
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 말한 것을 반드시 지켜야 한다
